Change Log

------------------
- First Release
- Basic cleaning, validation and formatting

------------------
- Second Release
- Added logics to format the number with the relevant area code as per state

------------------
- Third Release
- Bug fixes and improvements

0.0.4 (29/10/2021)
------------------
- Fourth Release
- Bug fixes and improvements
- Latest
